# Density-based clustering

# Installing packages
```{r}
library(dbscan)
library(factoextra)
```

# Iris data
```{r}
data("iris")
str(iris)
new <- iris[,-5]
```


# Obtaining optimal eps value
```{r}
kNNdistplot(new, k=3)
abline(h = 0.45, lty=2)
```



# Density-based clustering with dbscan and visualization
```{r}
d <- dbscan(x = new, eps = 0.5, minPts = 4)
fviz_cluster(d, new, geom = "point", main = "DBscan")
```
